Summary: Different sized star like objects with one large one and other smaller ones
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting looking at the stars in la verne, ca ( outside of pasadena). then what appeared to be a shooting star changed direction. the object looked to be in distress then out of no where multiple other smaller other ones came to it and were circling it with very fast, fluid motions. it was similar to the ones reported in seoul korea on august 18,2011: (you tube link moved to investigators field) cms 08\19\11 flg. after about an hour after it started a cloud moved and blocked the event and when the cloud moved they were gone.
trends: There has been one other sighting in La Verne
There were no other sightings in La Verne on or around August 19th 2011
